dockerfileTemplateData.desc: Dockerfiles are text documents that are used to build Docker containers, and ensure that they contain all of the elements required by the application running inside. The template data consists of contextual variables where Image Builder places build information or scripts, based on your container image recipe.

encrypted.desc: A flag that indicates if the target container is encrypted.

kmsKeyId.desc: Identifies which KMS key is used to encrypt the container image for distribution to the target Region.

virtualName.desc: Use to manage instance ephemeral devices.

userGroups.length: Minimum length of 1. Maximum length of 1024.

amis.desc: The EC2 AMIs created by this image.

containers.desc: Container images that the pipeline has generated and stored in the output repository.

s3BucketName.length: Minimum length of 1. Maximum length of 1024.
s3BucketName.desc: The Amazon S3 bucket in which to store the logs.

s3KeyPrefix.length: Minimum length of 1. Maximum length of 1024.
s3KeyPrefix.desc: The Amazon S3 path in which to store the logs.

pipelineExecutionStartCondition.desc: The condition configures when the pipeline should trigger a new image build. When the pipelineExecutionStartCondition is set to EXPRESSION_MATCH_AND_DEPENDENCY_UPDATES_AVAILABLE, and you use semantic version filters on the source image or components in your image recipe, EC2 Image Builder will build a new image only when there are new versions of the image or components in your recipe that match the semantic version filter. When it is set to EXPRESSION_MATCH_ONLY, it will build a new image every time the CRON expression matches the current time. For semantic version syntax, see CreateComponent in the EC2 Image Builder API Reference.

scheduleExpression.length: Minimum length of 1. Maximum length of 1024.
scheduleExpression.desc: The cron expression determines how often EC2 Image Builder evaluates your pipelineExecutionStartCondition. For information on how to format a cron expression in Image Builder, see Use cron expressions in EC2 Image Builder.

repositoryName.length: Minimum length of 1. Maximum length of 1024.
repositoryName.desc: The name of the container repository where the output container image is stored. This name is prefixed by the repository location.

service.desc: Specifies the service in which this image was registered.
